faq.title: Clear your doubts
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before you start validating ideas with real data.

sources.q: Where does the tool get its data from?
sources.a1: Valio.pro analyzes real conversations in online communities where your audience is already talking. We use the Perplexity API to track and synthesize discussions on Reddit, specialized forums, and other public communities.
sources.a2: We don't invent data or use predictions based on opaque algorithms. Everything we show you comes from real conversations: questions people ask, problems they express, and topics that generate genuine engagement.
sources.keyData: Key fact: We don't generate content, we validate real demand.

demandScore.q: What is the Demand Score and how is it calculated?
demandScore.a1: The Demand Score is our primary metric indicating the level of real interest in a topic in online communities. It's not a prediction of "virality", but a signal of existing demand.
demandScore.interpretation: The score is accompanied by a clear interpretation and a strategic recommendation: create, pilot, or reconsider.
demandScore.important: Important: A high score doesn't guarantee success, it indicates real demand. A low score can mean an emerging niche or a saturated topic.

time.q: How long does it take to give me results?
time.a1: Between 10 and 30 seconds, depending on the complexity of the topic and the number of conversations found.
time.a2: The analysis is in real-time: every time you validate an idea, we look for current conversations in relevant communities. We don't use pre-loaded databases or cached results.

updated.q: Is the data current or historical?
updated.a1: Current. Each validation analyzes recent conversations (mainly from the last 90 days) to give you a real picture of the current market.
updated.whyItMatters: Why it matters: A topic that was trending 2 years ago might be saturated today. We validate the now, not the past.

diff.q: How is it different from BuzzSumo or SparkToro?
diff.diffKey: Our key difference: We don't analyze existing content. We validate if it's worth creating something new.

decisions.q: How does it help me make decisions?
decisions.a1: Valio.pro is not a metrics dashboard. It is a decision system that reduces your uncertainty.
decisions.reasoningDesc: Why yes or why no (2-3 points)
decisions.philosophy: Philosophy: A premium SaaS doesn't show dataâ€”it reduces uncertainty. You'll know what to do, not just what the numbers say.

niche.q: Does it work for my specific niche?
niche.a1: Yes, as long as your audience has an online community presence (Reddit, forums, Quora, etc.).
niche.limitation: Honest limitation: If your niche is ultra-local or your audience doesn't participate in online communities, results will be limited. In those cases, we indicate it clearly.

formats.q: What types of content is it for?
formats.a1: For any format where you need to validate if the TOPIC has demand before producing it:
formats.noGen: We don't do: We don't generate content for you. We validate that it's worth creating.
